data.scheme_name: Scheme of Loan Assistance for Construction Projects - Partnership - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides loan assistance upto Rs. 700 lakhs  for setting up projects of eligible industrial activities for construction projects, covering land, building, amenities, and equipment costs.
data.eligibility: All units involved in residential, commercial, or mixed-use construction projects are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
To apply, the borrower must:

1. Have 5 years of construction experience.
2. Complete at least two projects of 1000 m² each.
3. Own land that meets Corporation standards.
4. Have all required approvals for a project of at least 1000 m².
5. Have a good financial history with loan accounts classified as "standard" for the past two years.
data.beneficiaries: All units involved in residential, commercial, or mixed-use construction projects are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
To apply, the promoter must:

1. Have 5 years of construction experience.
2. Complete at least two projects of 1000 m² or more.
3. Own land that meets Corporation standards.
4. Have all required approvals for a project of at least 1000 m².
5. Show a good financial record with loan accounts classified as "standard" for the past two years.
data.context: The Scheme of Loan Assistance for Construction Projects provides financial support for residential, commercial, or mixed-use construction projects, covering costs like land, construction, and equipment. It was started to boost infrastructure development and offer easier access to credit for qualified builders.
data.objective: The objective of starting this scheme is to facilitate infrastructure development by providing financial support to construction projects, ensuring that qualified builders can access funding for land, construction, and essential equipment.
data.description:
The scheme offers loans up to Rs. 700 lakhs, which must be repaid within 5 years, including a possible 2-year moratorium.

- Interest Rates:
 - For loans up to Rs. 50 lakhs and professional loans: 9.50% per year.
 - For loans above Rs. 50 lakhs: 10.50% to 13.50% per year.
 
 Interest rates are variable and will be updated on January 1st and July 1st each year.

- Borrower’s Contribution: Must be at least 25% of the project cost.
data.funding_mechanism: The loan will be given after completing legal paperwork and meeting all terms for sanction and disbursement. The amount disbursed will match the investments made in land, building, machinery, and other conditions specified in the sanction.
data.additional_info:
Security: The loan requires full coverage with a first charge on financed assets (land, building, machinery). Additional collateral can include commercial or residential non-agricultural properties, or other approved securities. Personal guarantees from promoters, directors, or other suitable individuals may be needed.

Fees:
- Processing Fee: 1% of the loan amount, up to Rs. 2 lakhs + GST.
- Preliminary Fee: Rs. 10,000 + GST.

Fees are non-refundable.
data.checklist_info_a:
Detailed Project Report
Land Records
Business proof
Term Loan Application Form
Certificate/Declaration
Biodata of the promoter/Partner/Director/Guarantor
Ownership documents of Primary, Additional  & Collateral Securities
Documents pertaining to Building / Civil works
Details of machinery proposed to be acquired
Last three years Income Tax Returns
Applicants bank details
Net worth certificate listing assets & liabilities with location details issued by Chartered Accountant (for loans above `50.00 lakhs)
Documents to be submitted post sanction of loan:
NOC from Goa IDC for land in industrial estates 
Income Tax Clearance under section 281 (1) (ii) of the Income Tax Act,1961
In case of companies:
Board Resolution
Consent letters from Directors to furnish their Personal Guarantee
Any other documents as stipulated in the Sanction Letter.
data.checklist_info_b: Goa Online, Government of Goa, India
data.beneficiary: Specific Construction Industry - Partnership - Goa - All MSME and All Non-MSME
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
